availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Rockcastle County, Kentucky, physician. Kentucky native. Father of John Crawford. Married to Nancy Evans Crawford. Married to Levira Denney Crawford. Served in the 7th U.S. Rangers (U.S.A.) as a corporal from 1812 to 1813. Physician in Rockcastle County, Kentucky, in 1850. Physician in Rockcastle County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Rockcastle County, Southern District, p. 173B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Rockcastle County, Mount Vernon, p. 586.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994053, Pulaski County Deaths.
War of 1812 Pension and Bounty Land Warrant Applications, 1812-1815, NARA RG 15, Roll RG15-1812PB-Bx0868.
"Adams Crawford (1782-1869)," Find A Grave, Memorial 13504065, accessed October 13, 2023, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/13504065.
